storyInfo: Don’t worry if you forgot to submit a report for your first field mission. Myrtle has her own way of filling them out.

attributes.content: Susan? Susan! Do you hear me? The enemy has heavy weapons not mentioned in the intel. We need fire support!
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Susan! Where are you—damn.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: We shouldn't have chased them here. How could they have a weapon like that... I knew nothing good would come of getting on their bad side!
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: We can still make it out of here! F-Forget the goods! Run!
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: Get down, you idiot! Stay in cover!
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Panicking won't do any good. Stay put while I think of something...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Stick close to me, guys! I'll provide support!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Don't give up! We've come this far! Take back the goods, and we'll make it back in time to book dinner at the fanciest restaurant!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: We won't live to see dinner if this goes poorly!
attributes.name: Caravan Leader

attributes.content: Mom always told me that running away is the surest way to lose! There aren't that many of them! We can beat 'em if we work together!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I'll cheer you guys on!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Now's not the time for that! Their supply station is over there. We might be able to hit it if we changed position...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: The enemy bombardment is easing up? Now's our chance! Get the others, Myrtle... Myrtle? Where are you?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: What... what are you doing?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: What? Why'd you stop?
attributes.name: Bandit Boss

attributes.content: Boss, look over there... something's not right...
attributes.name: Bandit

attributes.content: Susan... are you full yet?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm full. Oh... you can have this roasted leg.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Just don't choke on it...
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: We got five days off after completing that mission. You can eat here every day.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: And I'm not gonna waste a single one— Oh yeah!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: So I found this on my desk this morning. It says... er... 'Field Operator Mission Report Form'...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Do you know what it is?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: You didn't submit your mission report? It's your first mission. Didn't anyone tell you?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Mission report... I think I saw something like that, but I didn't know where to fill it out, and then I just forgot about it.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: So this is where I write my report? I just fill it in and submit it, right?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Easy-peasy! I'll do it right now.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Here, napkin. Wipe your hands first.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Let's get the dishes, Hoger.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Susan! I'm done!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Wow, that was quick!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Piece of cake!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Let's see... 'mission complete'... wait, that's it?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: 'Report—Mission complete.' Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: ...Myrtle, are you sure you know what a mission report is?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Of course do. When I was helping out at the mead store back home, I would write 'All checked' after I'd received and checked all the goods.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: But it was such a bother to write that every time, so I replaced it with a tick whenever I checked off an item.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Wasn't that smart?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: ...Let me explain.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: You have to write down what you did during the mission and your thoughts on it. Otherwise, it's just a piece of paper.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: The mission report is submitted to HR, and then to your supervisor. It's a very important part of our work. You need to take it seriously.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: What? That's such a pain!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Fine, I'll fill in all the blanks.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Code name: Myrtle... Combat experience... When I was five, I beat up a drunkard causing trouble on First Avenue...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: You don't need to go that far back... I just sent you a template, okay? You can follow it and fill out the first few sections.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Great! That makes it so much easier!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Hey, Hoger, wasn't the mission report due yesterday?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: You're right! I remember I got it in just before the deadline!
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Okay, Susan, I'm done. Can you check for me—oh!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Do you mean... it's too late to submit it?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Let me think... I think the reports are still being processed at HR.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I missed something so important on my first mission... Will I fail my trial period?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Calm down, Myrtle.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Is there any other way? Can I sneak into HR?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: S-Sneak in? Er... Hoger, you know a bunch of folks in HR. Do you know how long it usually takes for them to process this stuff?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Two or three days, I think. They're probably still... Hey, you don't mean—
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Just slip it into the pile and no one's the wiser.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: So I can sneak in then?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: But that's against the rules...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: I remember now! The operator's manual says you have to submit a mission report, but it doesn't say when!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: We wouldn't have had to deal with this if you'd just remembered that earlier.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Whew... Now I don't feel so anxious.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: It's too soon to relax. You need to fill it out ASAP and sneak it into the pile before they're all taken away!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: We'll help you recall what happened on the mission and finish the report, okay?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: O-Okay. I guess it's pretty serious.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Let's start from the beginning. Do you still remember?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Of course! We went into the barrens with that caravan. Our mission was to escort it to the destination.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Good. Write that down. Next?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Well... the sun was hot and the air was dry. I was thinking I should put on more sunscreen the next time—
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: You don't need to put in anything that doesn't have to do with the mission!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Alright, how about this? Just write down what I say.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: There was nothing out of the ordinary during the first half of the escort mission, aside from a few wild animal attacks.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: At 1604 hours... don't forget the zero.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: At 1604 hours, we encountered bandits in the wilderness. I was responsible for protecting the caravan and providing combat support.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: During the fighting, I made the decision to unload the goods from the trucks, which helped repel a wave of enemies.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Done? Let me see.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Here you go.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: 'And then I accidentally chased the enemy away...' That's totally different from what I said!
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Nice and simple, isn't it? Exactly as it happened.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Just that? But I saw you...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Yeah, I was protecting those guys.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: While you were fighting over there, I saw a bunch of people coming from the other side.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: A good generalissimo knows when to fight and when to retreat, so I called for them to get onto the trucks so that they could get out of there.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Then you unloaded the goods...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Less weight means more speed, right?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: ...So it was just an accident?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Should we put it in like she said, Susan?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: I guess we could, but...
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: You should think about how the accident had the effect it did. That's why we write reports, after all.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I have to put that in even if I didn't think about it?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Reports aren't just to let others know how we do things, or for command personnel to reference. They're for self-reflection too.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: In cases like this, we should consider the situation, weigh the pros and cons, find a solution, and put it into action. Mission reports are about writing down what you were thinking at the time.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: And if you weren't thinking, you should organize your thoughts now, in the report.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I see. So since there's a thought behind every action, and I should think about it now if I wasn't thinking during the mission?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Can I try to fill out the rest myself?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Sure. I'll look over it once you're done.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Hoger, there's something I need to check with you.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: The part where we chased the bandits back to their hideout and took the goods back... I was acting separately from you two at the time.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: You were fighting the bandits at close range while I provided fire support from above.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: We'd better cross-check the parts that I'm not entirely sure about, so that we can keep Myrtle... focused.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I remember that! We started fighting at the entrance of their base!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I wanted to lead the charge, but it was my first time seeing a battlefield like that, so all I could do was get the others to cover.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: That was more than enough.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: We had the advantage until they brought out some big thing, like, THIS big, that blew up a truck with one shot!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: We would've been blown up too, if you hadn't pull us into cover!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: There was no intel about any heavy weapons. It might have been a recent acquisition.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: I heard you talking about it over the comms. There was a lot of smoke and I was busy calibrating the distance, so I didn't really see what was happening.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I was wondering, though... How did the two of you charge into the fray under that kind of firepower?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: What did you do, Hoger?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I-It wasn't me. It was Myrtle...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: It was all thanks to Hoger! He was amazing!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I saw it with my own eyes!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Hoger leapt out of cover and charged forward with a war cry, and everyone else followed!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: The bandits must've been shocked, because they just stood there motionless! It was like they were under a spell!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: So Hoger just punched the guy, and down he went!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Hey, why are you guys so quiet?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I remember it all so clearly! I'm gonna write it down now.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Hoger...
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Myrtle, don't you remember what you did?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Me? I just did what you asked, keeping everyone safe and supporting them as much as I can. Last but not least—
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I gave everyone a morale boost, like a generalissimo should!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: It may have been my first mission, but I'm really good at that!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I-Is that all?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: ...That's not how it went. Wasn't it all thanks to you that we won?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Oh, stop teasing me, Hoger. Mom always told me not to take credit for something I didn't do.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: This is how it happened, Susan:
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Myrtle ran up to the front and jumped up on the ATV we were using for cover. Then...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: ...She raised her white flag high and waved it. Everybody could see it clearly.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: I was freaking out and trying to pull her down when I realized... it wasn't just us. The enemy was dumbfounded too.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: So I took the opportunity to charge in while they weren't shooting. The rest went as she described.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Oh yeah, I was waving my flag! Haha, forgot about that.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Well, it was nothing. It's the generalissimo's job to keep up morale!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: People always feel energized whenever they look at me! It always worked when I did it at home, anyway!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: That's it?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Yeah. To get something done, we all have to come together. We can do it if we work together!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: And there I was, wondering how you came up with the idea of waving a white flag...
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Sounds like it had an unexpected effect again. I think I know what to put in the report now...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: What are you going to write?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: My reflections, of course.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: 'Sometimes my actions have effects that I don't expect, but my teammates always take the opportunity to defeat the enemy.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Therefore, I need to trust the people behind me and do everything I can to support them...'
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: How's that?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Myrtle...
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: What do you think, Hoger? It does make sense, but I feel like it could lead to the wrong conclusions.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: ...Let's see the rest of it first.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: My hand hurts... is this good enough?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Yeah, I guess it's presentable.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Well, that was exhausting, but now I understand how you guys work! Very productive!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Are you sure you really understand?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Of course! Now comes the exciting part!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Did you take a look, Hoger?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Yeah, all of HR is in a meeting right now.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: I know the layout of their office. I think I can slip it in... My only concern is that someone might suddenly come back.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Myrtle, how about you wait for us with the report at the door to HR? We'll scout out the meeting room.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Don't let anyone from HR see you with it! The operation will fail if we're discovered.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: No problem, I got this.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Here we go.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: 30 minutes later...
She's not back yet...
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Could she have gone in already?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Impossible. You didn't even tell her where to put it... She couldn't have found another way, could she?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Shh, the HR folks are coming back.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Hey, Susan, look at what that guy's holding—
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: It's Myrtle's report!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Good evening, Susan! Did you need something?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Hey, just got a question... how did you get Myrtle's report?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Hm? Why do you ask?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Oh, well, er... we were on the same mission, and we submitted our reports a while ago, right?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: So seeing you guys take out Myrtle's report in particular makes me concerned that there might be a problem... yeah, a problem.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Oh, there's no problem. But honestly, I was wondering that myself, because the Doctor handed this to me just now.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: The Doctor?!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: The Doctor said something to the effect of, 'Next time, give the new recruits a little more time to submit their reports.'
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Even though the submission deadline for the new folks hasn't passed yet...
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Huh? So we spent half a day on that for—oh!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Thanks for your time—let's go find her, Hoger!
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Hey guys! I'm over here!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I was looking for you. Where are you going?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Myrtle? Where did you go?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: I came back from the Doctor's office... Sorry to keep you waiting.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Why did you go there? And how'd you wind up giving them your report?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: That's why I was looking for you! I ran into the Doctor on my way here.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: They asked how I was getting on, and I talked about how I hadn't handed my report in yet.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: That was okay because the Doctor isn't in the HR department, right?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: So they offered to take it for me, and I accepted. Since they're the boss, they'd get it in the end anyway, right?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: But then I remembered that I had kept you waiting here...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: And the Doctor let me grab some candies from the office!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: So here's the candy. Don't be mad at me, okay?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Give me one.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: One month later
Thanks for coming over today. I wanted to talk to you about Myrtle's performance.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's not that there's a problem. All the missions she's performed with you have gone smoothly. We just want to know more.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: ...I'd still like to know the reason you're asking.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Very well. There are some... discrepancies between her mission reports and yours.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Frankly, they don't even sound like they're from the same mission.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: ...Didn't she said she understood?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: It's our fault for taking her word for it.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Also... she submitted a few hand-drawn pictures along with her last report. Take a look.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: ...Generalissimo Myrtle's Tactics Manual?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: She seems to believe that operators who work with her should understand her tactical thinking. So she put this together so other operators could review it.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: You two have spend a lot of time with her. Do you have any, er... questions about her?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: ...Hoger?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Of course I do. Who doesn't?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: I don't think it matters, though. She has a knack for making things simple.
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: As far as I'm concerned, it's easier to just charge forward with her than try to understand her through those pictures. We can put our trust in an outstanding operator like Myrtle.
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: Understood. I have no further questions. Thank you for your time.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: (Whisper) That was the right conclusion to reach, right?
attributes.name: Operator Susan

attributes.content: (Whisper) I... guess?
attributes.name: Operator Hoger

attributes.content: Excuse me... could we borrow Myrtle's Tactics Manual for a couple of days?
attributes.name: Operator Susan
